Text: Todule̩ u kakini, O̩jo̩ kʼamone̩-wñ rinyo̩? O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na! Todu abo Israe̩l omi che, ugbe̩ Ebraham, abo o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin u che.
O̩jo̩ kʼamone̩-wñ kʼi ma ma tane̩ rinyo̩ n. Abe̩k ame̩ ma e̩wñ kʼO̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ka ef o̩la E̩laija abu kʼi rodubʼO̩jo̩ bʼabo Israe̩l ma n?
I kakini, Ondu, ma fʼamakache̩-we̩ kpa me̩, ma fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩-we̩ kpo̩fo̩; oñ i bo̩ omi kate, ma la tene oji e-mi.
Ab O̩jo̩ muda dʼohi ñw u? I kakini, Aboke̩le̩ icham me̩jo̩ nyʼulo̩gwa ku ma ma kʼokuku nyane̩ ñwu Beal in bo̩ ñwu mi.
Abe̩le̩ iko-i ge̩, e̩fiye̩-ma ku ma chi lef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ chebo̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼi chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ che, mak i ño̩ kwef uko̩lo̩ eche ge̩ n; cho̩kpo̩ni ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ma ño̩ chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ge̩ n.
E̩wñ le̩ ta? O̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l la tu e̩wñ ku ma tene le̩ n; o̩wo̩ abo ku ma chi le̩ tʼu, i muda chi nyʼabo ki bo̩ o̩la,
i dʼalu ku ma ko̩tane̩ le̩ kakini,
Defid la kakini,
eju-ma ki chubi ku ma we egane̩;
Todule̩ u kakini, Ma ro̩ko̩ibu todu ku ma wane̩? O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na! Uñwanane̩-ma muda je̩ ñw ujadu do̩mo̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi, todu kʼi nyi abo Israe̩l ogu eja.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼuñwanane̩-ma chʼe̩wñ ene̩ nana ñw abo ile̩ kʼofu ki bu ma je̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi ki nʼe̩wñ nana, mak e̩wñ-ma jo̩ kpa fa i atule ololo n?
U muda aka ñw ame̩ abo uche̩ichi todabu kʼomi chʼe̩nukpuche̩ ku ma kpe̩ nyʼugbo abo uche̩ichi, nabʼojima mʼuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ñw one̩ kʼu nache,
natene ugbo du kʼu nanyʼabo o̩re̩la-mi le̩ ogu eja, kʼu fʼiche̩kibo̩ jadu kwef uma.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼeko ma rinyo̩ chʼuño̩ru ñw abo ile̩, emʼuma gba fa ki ma chʼiñmi kwef abo ki ku n?
I la che̩wñ kʼejo̩ga e̩wñ afo̩ mak abe̩le̩ o̩gbo̩dudu-wñ de̩; iche̩wñ kʼili oli afo̩, mak abe̩le̩ e̩to̩-wñ de̩ ge̩.
I muda che̩wñ ku ma fʼe̩to̩-wñ iche̩kibo̩ nya, taku ma fʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ chʼoli o̩lif efoko be̩nyʼu tʼef uma, kʼuwe̩ la mud e̩ne̩ kʼuwe̩ kpʼama mana nyʼili oli o̩lif le̩ kʼe̩ la ñmʼomi o̩la-wñ,
uwe̩ ki buba ñw e̩to̩-wñ n; i muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ buba, i chʼuwe̩ nʼili le̩ n, chai ili nʼuwe̩.
Todule̩ uwe̩ akakini, Ma fʼe̩to̩-wñ nya ku ma fʼumi be̩nyʼu koji.
I nyo̩; tod eko̩ ku ma ko̩ eke̩do̩no oñ ma fʼuma nya, e̩do̩ ekono la chʼe̩wñ kʼuwe̩ dago. E̩ ki ke n, chai ailo-wñ ki nabʼe̩,
todu iche̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ ma do̩wo̩mʼe̩to̩ kʼoli le̩ ta o̩to̩to̩la-wñ n, i la adowomʼuwe̩ ni ge̩.
Todule̩ e̩ nago umo̩la O̩jo̩ kpai ukpuna-wñ ta. Ukpuna-wñ dʼoji abo ki wane̩, umo̩la O̩jo̩ la dʼoji e-we̩, iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ adʼef umo̩la-wñ alo waa; cho̩kpo̩ni ma ñʼakʼuwe̩ da tinyo̩ ge̩.
Oñ abo-i ge̩, iche̩wñ ku ma ma ko̩ eke̩do̩no gbogbo alo n, ma afʼuma be̩nyʼu, todu O̩jo̩ neke dabi fʼuma be̩nyʼu ge̩.

Todu iche̩wñ ku ma fʼuwe̩ ko̩da kwef oli o̩lif e-efoko, ku ma la fʼuwe̩ be̩nyʼoli o̩lif e-unyi kʼuwe̩ ma chʼe̩to̩-wñ kwʼabakwane̩ n, i chʼabo ku ma chʼe̩to̩ e-unyi kwʼabakwane̩ oñ ma abe̩nyʼoli o̩lif e-ma tule n?
Todu, amo̩maye, i dʼumi e̩do̩ ku me̩ chʼugbodu afili-i n, tode̩gba ku me̩ mud amanibe ej o̩la-me̩, kakini, E̩do̩ eno̩ ke̩re̩bʼabo Israe̩l iche̩ka gbogbo tak aluka abo uche̩ichi ki jo̩ kpa;
tak abe̩le̩ ma ajadu abo Israe̩l chaka alu ku ma ko̩tane̩ kakini,
alo kʼomi akpe̩ kpai ama,
I chʼe-Uche̩nyo̩ ma chʼame̩nebi lugbo e-me̩; i muda chʼe-one̩ echi ma chʼabo ufe̩do̩ lugbo abogijo igbele le̩.
Todu ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai udo̩ kʼO̩jo̩ adʼone̩ nʼeribeda n.
Todu alu kʼame̩ ko̩ egbʼo̩la O̩jo̩ gbo̩ akwoubi, ku ma la li ume̩ ejumomi fai lef eko̩ kʼabo-i ko̩ egbagbo̩,
abe̩le̩ abo-i ño̩ ko̩ egbʼo̩la gbo̩ fa-i, todu kʼi ño̩ li uma ejumomi lef ejumomi e-me̩ kʼi li.
Todu O̩jo̩ fʼo̩na re nyʼo̩chaka amone̩ tef eko̩ egbagbo̩ todu kʼi li o̩chaka-ma ejumomi.
O, anana O̩jo̩ ki nʼefu, kpai ibe kpai ema kʼi ma e̩wñ! Ili oj ajo̩-wñ kʼi akpa jʼagwa n, o̩na-wñ jʼate̩ n!
Todu e̩ne̩ ma ibe Ondu? abe̩k e̩ne̩ te̩tabʼo̩ lʼo̩la?
Abe̩k e̩ne̩ du e̩wñ ñw owñ o̩gba taku ma adabi du ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ koji?
Todu owñ chʼe̩te̩ e̩wñ du, e̩wñ du lef uwñ wa, e̩wñ du la do̩mo̩ ñw owñ. O̩jima ki chʼe-wñ ogbegbele̩. Ami.
